mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PARTICIPANTS(PARTICIPANTS_CODE, WALKROOM_CODE, RELATION_CODE, PARTICIPANTS_START) VALUES(#{participants_code}, #{walkroom_code}, 'REL003', SYSDATE)
